items.content:
At Midrive, we’re reinventing driving and insurance for the digital generation. The old way of doing things is broken. 53% of learners fail their first test. Of those who pass, 1 in 5 crash in the first 6 months. That’s unacceptable.

Our technology helps learners find top-rated instructors and access pay-as-you-go insurance, so they can pass-first time and ultimately become safer drivers.

Since launch, over 300,000 young people in the UK have used our apps, data and tech to gain their independence. We are growing quickly and are now available in over 100 towns and cities in the UK, expanding to a new one each week.

Founded in 2013, Midrive has raised over £7.5m to date from a respected group of well-connected and supportive investors ‒ including Holiday Extras and Initial Capital. You may have heard about our recent crowdfunding round which was the 4th largest equity fund-raise target in Crowdcube's history.

We’ve recently been named #19 in the Startup 100, the annual ranking of the most game-changing and exciting new businesses launched in the last three years. We were also named ‘Digital Business of the Year’ by the Federation of Small Businesses in 2017.

Want to help us build the future of learner driving and insurance? Then join us!

Find out more about us at Midrive.com

REQUIREMENTS

We’re looking for someone with extensive hands-on experience of Google Adwords search campaign management, which would be their main focus in their current role. Data driven and methodical in their approach to performance marketing, they would have a proven ability to drive swift improvements in campaign performance.

This is an exciting opportunity to have an impact managing performance marketing for a fast growth startup! The purpose of the role is to drive efficiencies and growth in our performance marketing channels, including Adwords paid search and paid social campaigns.


Role objectives:

Build a best-in-class performance optimised paid search strategy.
Draw out actionable insights from performance marketing campaign data.
Analyse and report on campaign performance, refining CPA and ROI on all campaigns.
Plan, execute and report on all performance marketing channel tests and trials.
Develop initiatives to scale performance marketing channels in tandem with Midrive’s instructor supply growth across UK postcode areas.
Constantly seek out and trial relevant new channels.
Ensure all ad copy and creative is optimised to deliver the right message to target audiences, reflecting points of difference, addressing known customer interests and pain points in an engaging way.
Work closely with SEO, content and operations teams to share insights from paid performance.

Key skills and experience:

In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience managing Google Adwords. This is a required skill that you will be tested on, so only apply if you are confident that you meet this requirement.
Working knowledge of Facebook Ads and Google Analytics.
Good understanding of audience targeting and remarketing strategies.
Practical understanding of attribution modelling.
Experience managing large or complex paid performance channel budgets.

About you:

You have lived and breathed Adwords campaign management for at least 1-2 years, and are fully up-to-date with every targeting option and campaign management enhancement in the Adwords interface.
You may have gained your experience at a digital advertising agency, managing paid search campaigns on Google Adwords, or client-side in a B2C direct response focused business.
You find working with data stimulating, and can quickly draw out insights from performance marketing campaign data reports.
With a startup mentality, you are self motivated, a problem solver, ambitious, hard working, collaborative, and want to have an impact on business performance.
Ability to approach tasks as a team, and work in a fast-paced environment.
Excellent attention to detail and a well organised, structured approach to work and the ability to keep projects on track.
You speak and write in English fluently and idiomatically.

BENEFITS

At Midrive, we work hard, so that's why we make sure that we have best facilities to play harder! We have a host of perks: Free coffee and snacks, Wednesdays treats, Happy Hour Thursdays, team yoga sessions, and training/sharing sessions. We also have regular fun social events - recent adventures have included a glamping trip, escape rooms, comedy clubs, and silent discos.

Midrive is simply a great place to work. We have a fantastic team of talented people working on an interesting product they are passionate about, and a friendly, social atmosphere. We're also a dog friendly office! Add to that competitive salaries, pension plan, and other perks, it's clear why we're a top choice.

DIVERSITY

Diversity and inclusion are essential values at Midrive. We know we'll do our best and most impactful work when we feel we're represented and we belong. We're proud to actively recruit and hire talented people from a wide variety of backgrounds and experiences. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=3, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
_*This role is based in Munich*_

*About us*

GoCardless is building a new global network for recurring bank-to-bank payments. We’re cutting out the intermediaries and linking together direct debit schemes from around the world to create a simple way of collecting payments directly from customers’ bank accounts.

We’ve already won noteworthy German customers, including Magicline and Brandnooz, and have partnerships in place with both best-in-class global and German platforms, including Zuora, Sage and Billwerk. We currently process €3.5bn each year for over 30,000 organisations across the UK and Europe - and we’re growing over 100% year on year.

We’re backed by some of the world’s leading investors including Balderton Capital, Accel Partners, Notion Capital, Passion Capital and Y Combinator.

We’re looking for a talented and passionate German Marketing Manager to drive awareness and adoption of GoCardless in Germany. Focusing on our target segments you’ll be responsible for creating and executing on the marketing strategy generating interest and driving leads and revenue.



*Your role*

Working closely with the German General Manager and Sales team, you will be responsible for developing and implementing the German marketing strategy to deliver on the the agreed goals for Germany.
Owning the German marketing budget, you’ll be responsible for planning and implementing specific activities to drive awareness of GoCardless and generate a consistent stream of quality leads and customers to meet the revenue targets.

Supported by the wider Marketing team and a network of freelancers and/or agencies you’ll execute and optimise on campaigns to ensure we’re attracting and retaining the right type of businesses within our core target segments.



*What we're looking for*

We’re looking for a self-starter, excited by an opportunity to grow a rapidly expanding business in a relatively new market. We’d love to hear from you if you have an entrepreneurial spirit, enjoy working in small, autonomous cross-functional teams and are willing go the extra mile to get a job done.

*You should apply if:*

* You have a strong marketing background in B2B businesses in the German market
* You are experienced in working across multiple marketing channels, optimising the mix and the messaging for different audiences
* You are commercially astute and results driven, with strong quantitative analytical skills using tools such as Google Analytics and Tableau
* You have experience and are comfortable owning social media channels and monitoring engagement levels
* You are customer focused ensuring that your messaging and communications resonates with the target audience generating quality leads and long lasting relationships
* You are a self-starter who thrives on working independently with small cross functional teams and is comfortable with working remotely from the central business
* You have excellent communication and written skills and enjoy creating and editing great content
* You’re able to work across multiple teams and manage both agencies and freelancers
* German mother tongue and fluent in English mandatory, French or Spanish knowledge a plus

_Our team comes from a variety of backgrounds, and we embrace diversity – if you’re unsure, please apply._

items.content:
MARKETING ASSOCIATE

Capdesk is looking for a Marketing Associate to join ASAP.  

We’re changing the world of finance across Europe and we want a smart, hard-working and creative marketing associate to help us. Our small but expanding UK team is based in London just off Shoreditch High Street.

This is a fantastic opportunity for a bright candidate to get into the world of FinTech and take on responsibility as one of the first junior hires on the team. You’ll see first-hand what it takes to build an industry leading FinTech startup as you’ll be working closely everyday with the CEO, Head of Sales and Head of Customer Success.

COMPANY

At Capdesk we are on a mission to change the way that start-ups and investors manage their shareholdings and investments. We launched in Denmark in 2015 and gained customers across the Nordics. In 2016 we moved over to the UK and in 2017 we really solidified our presence here.

We’re already helping some of the tech scene’s major players by removing the headaches associated with organising Shareholder Registers and Option Plans. Companies like Secret Escapes, Tab Media, Money Dashboard & Nutmeg. That’s why we’re Europe’s leading equity management platform. But this is just the start for us. 2019 promises to be a huge year at Capdesk and we want you to help continue our fantastic growth.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

- Actively manage and promote our blog, and articles.

- Researching and organizing facts and sources.

- Writing and proof reading a wide variety of topics for multiple platforms and overseeing the production of all marketing materials (website, blogs, articles, social updates, banners, case studies, guides, white papers, emails etc.)

- Working with in-house designers to produce materials of visual impact and within brand guidelines.

- Create content marketing campaigns to drive leads and subscribers

- Use SEO best practices to generate traffic to our site.

CANDIDATE

You should be excited about getting in on the ground floor of a fast-growing FinTech startup with a presence across Europe. We will teach you the technical aspects of how start-up financing works so we don’t expect a financial background or any formal training. However, this role is best suited to someone who has a natural passion for startups and wants to learn more.

We are looking for hires who can grow with the business so that means having a passion for learning and coming up with new ideas. We want people to own the process and continuously look for a better way to get things done.

BENEFITS

- Be part of a fast growing startup

- Work closely with the Co-founders everyday

- Free team lunch every day! We normally go to somewhere around Spitalfields Market or - Devonshire Square

- First junior hire on the team. Great opportunity for growth

- Work for company with expansion plans across Europe

APPLY

Please be in touch soon as we’ll proceed once the right person is found. If you’d like to apply please submit a CV to christian@capdesk.com

Content Marketing Intern at Reedsy

Western Europe, United States, Canada, Remote · Internship

We are a fast-growing startup, recognized as one of the most exciting companies in the publishing space. We're a remote team of 16 and speak 10 languages. Come build the future of this industry with us.

Applied
Apply to Reedsy
Add a message to Reedsy
Apply

Job Description

#About Reedsy

We’re here to help authors find world-class professionals to create amazing books. Our curated marketplace gathers some of the best freelancers — the likes of Stephen King's designer, Neil Gaiman's editor or Walter Isaacson's publicist.

Using a content marketing-led strategy, we’ve grown to a community of 100,000 authors in just a few short years (while picking up a number of industry awards along the way). Funded by Europe’s top business angels and VCs, we want to make it possible for anyone looking to publish a high-quality book to do it successfully.

Want to help us?

#Job Description

You will take a hands-on role in executing Reedsy’s content marketing strategy, with a focus on creating and exploiting blog content to acquire leads. You will learn and action the marketing team’s proven approach for:

Keyword research: determining what topics and keywords to attack;
Content creation: how to write a best-in-class blog post that blows the competition out of the water;
Content promotion: getting eyeballs and clicks;
Working efficiently in a flexible, independent, remote environment.

In short, if you have an interest in startup culture and want to know how to rapidly acquire targeted leads, then this is your perfect role.

#Person Specification
Strong interest in content marketing, SEO and startups;
Native-level English speaker;
Can communicate ideas clearly and succinctly through writing;
Strong attention to detail.

#Bonus Points
A proven writing background (i.e. blogs, essays)
Fluent in a second language
A strong dash of ambition (without any BS)
An urge to initiate and act on your own ideas
Good sense of humor

#Want to know why you should join us?
Watch this video: https://youtu.be/3ey0FX19eVo

#How to Apply
We currently receive over 30 applications every day, so generic messages almost never get a second look.

To stand out, make sure you:

1) Do some research on Reedsy and sign up to try the product;
2) Include a well-structured and **concise** message with your application. Explain why you find Reedsy interesting and why you'd be a good fit;
3) Show off what you have to offer — but not too much :)

Compensation
$0K–$5K
No Equity
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

Marketing/Growth Hacker at Knack

Earth, United States, Remote · Full Time
We do things a little differently and we like it that way. Our team is close-knit, highly-engaged, 100% remote, and dedicated to building a world-class product striving to democratize data and app building. Read More

We do things a little differently and we like it that way. Our team is close-knit, highly-engaged, 100% remote, and dedicated to building a world-class product striving to democratize data and app building.

We're looking for some kindred spirits to join us on this crazy ride.

Find out more at:
https://www.knack.com/work-at-knack

Applied
Apply to Knack
Add a message to Knack
Apply

Job Description

We’re looking for a marketing and growth hacker to help drive Knack's efforts in identifying markets and executing growth initiatives.

We've been managing growth but now it's time to start accelerating!

This position will straddle the traditional marketing world, SEO and Adwords, and the new techniques of growth-hacking, with a heavy emphasis on data and analysis to run experiments and validate hypotheses.

What You'll Do
- Understand Knack users and the competitive market landscape.
- Know the product roadmap and market trends intimately to help devise, plan, and execute strategies and tactics in additional to product launches, to drive awareness and new trials of Knack.
- Manage online marketing efforts including SEO and content marketing.
- Manage the execution of marketing tactics to support audience-specific strategies—everything from blogs, infographics, videos, tweets to landing page messaging – we want you to think outside the box.

What We’re Looking For
- A deep understanding of SaaS analytical numbers like LTV, CAC, Churn, etc.
- Experience in online marketing areas like SEO, content marketing, and PPC campaigns.
- Demonstrated customer focus, with an ability to understand, simplify, and communicate complex ideas
￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼- Analytical skills: analyze user data and implement appropriate tracking to measure marketing success
- A desire to be a part of a long-term, profitable business that makes a great product loved by thousands of customers.

About Knack

Knack is a no-code platform that makes it easy for anyone to build applications and workflows to do amazing things with their data.

Knack launched in 2012 and has been growing steadily as we’ve built our team, perfected our product, and nailed our product-market fit. We’re now ready to take things to the next level and maximize the opportunity for what this product can be.

So why are we different?

We’re bootstrapped: we’ve had to build something our customers actually pay for. This changes how you do things.

We’re 100% remote: and have been from the beginning. Every decision we’ve made has been based around optimizing our remote operations.

We’re small: and we like it that way. We’re more than just chat avatars-- we’ve all gotten to know each other, have grown together, and love working with each other.

We enjoy the journey: we’re in this for the long haul. We’re not chasing an exit or the next round of funding. We’re building something we’re proud of and want to keep improving on.

You can read more about Knack and the team here.

Benefits & Compensation

Define your work: our only rule is our overlap zone of 11am to 4pm EST. Otherwise find the location, environment, and schedule that is best for your life and work. It’s not about separation, it’s about optimization.

Unlimited Paid Vacation: take the time you need to stay motivated, charged, and balanced. You’ll get forced days off for birthdays and knackiversaries.

Paid Corporate Retreats: we get together twice a year at amazing locations to do normal human being things in person. We pay for your flight, lodging, and meals.

Learning Credits: an annual allowance is provided to stay on top of your game with classes, books, and conferences.

HealthCare: we offer health, vision, and dental, covering 75% of the premium for you and your dependents (spouse + children).

Skills
Analytics & Reporting, Product Marketing, SaaS, Conversion Optimization, A/B Testing, Landing Page Optimization, Google Analytics, Google Adwords, Funnel Optimization
Compensation
$85K–$110K
0.5%–2.5%
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

What We're Building

Knack enables non-programmers to do amazing things with their data. It's the central hub that makes it easy to do something useful with all of your data.

Knack starts with storing your data in a simple online database. You can then build simple web apps using search, forms, tables, and more to display, update, and share that data. These apps make it easy to manage and analyze the data, build workflows, share it with other users, and integrate it with other services.

Apps can be published to any site and adapt to the surrounding design. Multiple versions can be published to different sites and for different audiences.

Developers can extend these apps with a RESTful API, custom CSS, and JS event handlers.

Content Marketing at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Do you enjoy watching films? Does learning new things excite you? Are you curious about the world around you? Are you a communicator?

We’re looking for content/ marketing interns to join shortfundly, which has grown in over a year from just an idea to being one of Asia’s leading online short film promotion platform.

The applicant should also:
– loves films, people, technology
– loves, eats and breathe social media
– have basic skills in Photoshop, Word processing
– based in chennai/kerala/hyderabad/Mumbai/Anywhere in South central Asia (India / sri lanka / Singapore / Malaysia)

Responsibilities:
_ Write blog post about our platform product / short films / film festival events
_ Share this & put content marketing techniques to reach global short film filmmaker audience and acquire users.

Our team consists of folks of diverse experience and interests and we are keen to share our thoughts and learning along the way as we chart new grounds.
If you are interested, please write to: support@shortfundly.com with your brief self introduction, name and contact number. Share your linkedin profile.

Perks of working at Shortfundly

– Watching video/ short films/ viral content is part of the job

– Interacting with filmmakers/ artists/ models is part of the job

– Discussing film stories/ brainstorming on scripts/ creating videos is part of the job

We realised that we were not alone: how can our stories find its own voice among the noise?

As technology is a big part of our DNA, we embarked on this journey to enable the process of discovery for this generation of audiences: for local and regional films to be consumed locally, and to create a gateway for great Asian films for a global audience

With a growing audience to the ﬁlms, we aim to support both consumers and producers of film content in this thriving ecosystem.

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. Marketing
c. Startup culture

Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different shortfilm categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the shortfilm festival circuit. Shortfundly shares plenty of new films every day. We are planning for big expansions in the future into other languages. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

We are looking for a “Superstar” Marketing who take this to 100,000 customers within one year. If you are looking a challenge and ready to chase numbers, this could be it. We won't offer any salary hikes or comfy office, but we offer a great role with full ownership and grow with the company.

Roles
- Increase customer acquisition through Online and Offline marketing
- Strong experience towards Digital Marketing
- Bring in new ideas and execute them
- Tracking and managing marketing campaigns
- Sell the product with positioning not with discounts
- Create a buzz around the brand Shortfundly
- Scaling the marketing team along with business requirements

Requirements
- Worked on B2C brand before in marketing
- Examples of successful marketing campaigns executed
- Managed teams and interacted across levels
- Knowledge of Tamil and/or other Southern Languages would be a plus

Lets us know in 3 to 5 lines, why you are a Superstar “Marketer” in your email to be considered. Mail to support@shortfundly.com.

Looking for Marketing guy with creative bent at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. Marketing
c. Startup culture
Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different short film categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the short film festival circuit. We are planning for big expansions in the future into other languages. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

Qualification – Doesn’t matter

Experience – 0 to 2 years in sales/ marketing/ script writing/ video making

Location – Any location

Perks of working at Shortfundly

– Watching video/ short films/ viral content is part of the job

– Interacting with filmmakers/ artists/ models is part of the job

– Salary with an ESOP component to the tune of 0.5% to 1.00%.

– Discussing film stories/ brainstorming on scripts/ creating videos is part of the job

:)

Role and Responsibilities:

We need to put our marketing efforts to bring shortfilm makers to our platform
Getting partnership to publish shortfilm in our platfrom through film institute in india.
One more thing, getting shortfilm festival event organizing people to our platform and help them to organize their festival super easy.
Skills – marketing / script writing/ video making

Why you should join:

To learn marketing, get chance to meet all film celebrity and grow your career at fast pace

Let’s change the experience of short film watching and sharing, together!

If you are interested, please write to: support@shortfundly.com with your brief self introduction, name and contact number. Share your linkedin profile.

PR / Syndication Manager at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. PR (press release activities) Brand building
c. Startup culture

Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different shortfilm categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the shortfilm festival circuit. Shortfundly shares plenty of new films every day. We are planning for big expansions in the future into other languages. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

The PR and content syndication role involves seeking and maintaining content partnerships with online publishers worldwide. You will also write press releases for our shortfundly, manage public relations with regional media and handle press engagements to promote our shortfundly further!

You will be working closely with the content team to curate and syndicate short films to external content and media partners.

You should have:

Passion for films and stories
Knowledge of online media and editorial trends
Good writing and communication skills
Creative and enthusiastic about learning
Prior experience in a PR role (preferably)
This role requires you to be based in Chennai

Experience – 0 to 2 years

Qualification – Doesn’t matter

Our team consists of folks of diverse experience and interests and we are keen to share our thoughts and learnings along the way as we chart new grounds. If you are interested, please write to: support@shortfundly.com with your brief self introduction, name and contact number. Share your linkedin profile.

Perks of working at Shortfundly

– Watching video/ short films/ viral content is part of the job

– Interacting with filmmakers/ artists/ models is part of the job

– Discussing film stories/ brainstorming on scripts/ creating videos is part of the job

items.title: Chief Marketing Officer
items.content:
Volunteer Role Description

Job Title: Chief Marketing Officer
Team: Marketing
Location: Remote
Reporting to: CEO
Staff Management: Marketing Team (between 6-8 volunteers)
Job Type: Volunteer
Time Commitment: 8 hours minimum per week (plus any more time you are able to offer)

We Make Change gives you the power to change the world.

Our platform enables anyone, anywhere to use their skills to make the change they want to see.

We connect purpose-driven individuals with high-impact NGOs to develop projects supporting the causes they care about.

This is an unpaid volunteer opportunity, but whatever skill you have and whatever cause you care about, you can change the world. By becoming a Changemaker you can help to make it happen!

Main Purpose of the Job
To inform, inspire and empower people to change the world through engaging, innovative and distinctive marketing.

Overview of the Role & Team
This position will involve overseeing all of the organisation’s marketing activities and initiatices. This will involve coordinating the activity of the team as well as contributing to the various areas of marketing, including social media and PR, where necessary. Working in collaboration with people from across the organisation and reporting to the CEO, this role is key to increasing the awareness of the organisation and its activities.

Responsibilities
Providing effective leadership to the Marketing Team.
Coordinating and organising the activity of the Marketing Team.
Support the Social Media Manager in executing a social media strategy that will inspire people to take action to support the causes they care about.
Work with the Bloggers to create fun and engaging blog content, ensuring content is posted regularly.
Engage with NGOs from around the world to develop content for social media, blogs and PR.
Work with the PR Officer to plan, develop and implement PR strategies and campaigns.
Developing good working relationships with the media.
Collaborate with other members of the We Make Change Team to manage reputation, identify key players and coordinate actions.

Requirements
Professional experience working in social media, marketing or PR is required.
Excellent writing, editing (photo/video/text), and communication skills.
Knowledge of online marketing and good understanding of major marketing channels.
Positive attitude and detail oriented with good multitasking and organisational ability.
Fluency in written and spoken English

Location
The role will be performed remotely, so applications are welcomed from across the world.

As the role is as a volunteer, it is unpaid, but it offers a great opportunity to gain experience, while helping to change the world!

Whatever cause you care about, whatever skill you have, if you want to change the world, then become a Changemaker by applying today.

items.title: Digital Sales Assistant / Business Dev Exec
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=3, nodejs=1, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=9}
items.content:
We’re a specialist, award-winning digital agency famed for designing, building, maintaining, optimising and promoting e-commerce websites with our unique psychology-based approach.

*Goal:*

To support agency growth through winning new client business by:

* Ensuring all inbound prospects & opportunities are responded to, qualified and filtered promptly.
* Liaising with the relevant department heads & digital strategist to develop compelling proposal & pitch documentation.
* Keeping accurate records on all opportunities and communications, and managing follow up communications
* Assisting the Sales Director in onboarding new business and transitioning new business to the Client Services team for delivery.

*Outcomes:*

* Qualify all new opportunities
* Develop new client proposals
* Support with closing new business opportunities

*Job Description:*

This is a new, full-time, London-based position for a Sales Support Administrator.

A fantastic opportunity for someone who is energetic, organised and hungry to grow new business and be part of a successful and growing digital marketing agency. You will be the backbone of our sales team, reporting directly to our Sales Director and supporting him with our ongoing new business growth.

You will be responsible for managing all new opportunities in our sales funnel end-to-end; As such you will be required to promptly qualify all inbound prospects, proactively follow up all suitable opportunities, managing the delivery of proposals and pitch documentation (alongside the Sales Director) and ensuring there is a smooth transition to our delivery teams for all new business won.

*What the job will entail:*

* Qualifying all prospects and opportunities that come through the agency
* Working closely our digital strategists and heads of department to collate strategies and create compelling proposals & pitches
* Managing all opportunities and keeping records within the agencies CRM
* Managing the after-sales process and ensuring new clients are on-boarded smoothly and client services teams are fully briefed.
* Keeping abreast of the latest digital marketing trends and strategies and communicating these to potential clients with a view to converting them into paid clients

*Required Competencies:*

* Highly Personable and great with people
* Ability to communicate a specialist subject clearly to potential clients
* An understanding or strong desire to learn about digital marketing, including PPC, SEO & CRO.
* Smart, presentable and professional.
* Great with prioritisation. You must be able to balance the ‘reactive’ side of the job with the longer-term goals.
* Attention to detail, particularly with reporting results
* Dynamic and results driven with the ability to work well under pressure
* Ability to work independently and towards your own goals
* Be hungry for personal development and success
* Have the willingness to ask for help when needed
* Have complete ownership and accountability of your own work

*Experience*

* You must be able to demonstrate that you are an excellent communicator and good with people.
* High level of Literacy & Numeracy skills
* Digital experience is preferable but not a must but must be quick and eager to learn.

*The team you will be joining:*

We are looking for a driven, hungry individual to join our awesome and already growing team.

On top of this, we want to make sure that each candidate is a good fit within our team and our company culture. We only want to work with candidates that reflect our core beliefs:
* Strive for excellence (not mediocrity)
* There is a way around everything. It’s just a matter of finding it.
* Choose Growth, Not Protection
* Empower and inspire each other.
* Contribute your ideas, don’t simply take orders.
* Stay lean, go fast and break things.
* Never stop learning, Be Curious and Adapt to win.

*What you will get:*

* To work for a fast growing, awesome company that you love going in to work for.
* The opportunity to do what you love with the chance of a fast-track career progression.
* A personalised training program and mentoring to be completely awesome at your role.
* Work with fun, creative and driven employees that love what they do.
* A very competitive salary.
* The chance to build and grow your own account management department.
* Access to our bank of psychology, e-commerce and marketing and sales knowledge.
* Access to our library of books, articles and training courses.
* Unlimited fruit and coffee (and on Friday, beer, wine, bubbles, or anything your heart desires).
* Be at the forefront of the digital marketing revolution (we are way ahead of most agencies – what you’ll learn with us, you’ll use forever!)

Are you blessed with the gift of the gab? We’d love to help you start the career of your dreams in digital sales. We’ll teach you everything you need to know about working in a busy publishing sales team. You’ll learn transferable skills you can apply to many other digital publishing roles.

The role goes for 3 months to begin, but can become full-time for the right person. Candidates must be available to commit to at least 30 hours per week.

Acquisitions and Asset Management Analyst (Pangea) at ConsenSys

Brooklyn, Remote · Full Time
We're a fluid organization comprised of deep thinkers from a variety of backgrounds.Read More

We're a fluid organization comprised of deep thinkers from a variety of backgrounds.

We're passionate about our work and are looking to find others who are interested in building solutions for an emerging, digitally-integrated economy. 

Please see our website for current opportunities. https://consensys.net/open-positions/

Applied
Apply to ConsenSys
Add a message to ConsenSys
Apply

Job Description

Pangea is seeking an investment professional who is excited about the intersection of real estate and blockchain. The individual will be a thoughtful, intelligent and well-rounded investment professional who has a deployed capital in real estate in individual assets and/or REITs. The individual will be involved in the early days of Pangea and have end-to-end responsibility for various real estate asset investments from sourcing, due diligence, acquisition, to asset management. The individual will pursue numerous investment leads, build financial models, review legal documents, and pitch investment ideas to Pangea’s acquisitions team. On a daily basis, the Pangea team will support the individual through the investment process and help develop both qualitative and quantitative analytical skills.

Responsibilities and Duties
· Financial Analysis - value properties and their underlying debt structures using discounted cash flow analysis, comparative sales, and expected value of various outcome scenarios.
· Qualitative Analysis - write investment memoranda that thoughtfully assesses key investment risks
· Legal Review - read, analyze and summarize legal documents pertaining to acquisitions.
· Deal Generation - contact banks, private lenders, and other creditors regarding specific leads to gauge interest in transacting. Lead offers, negotiate deals, and follow through to closing.
· Investment Tracking and Reporting - track business plan progress, periodically value existing investments, and prepare investor reporting.
· Property Operations - ensure collateral is protected, oversee court appointed receivers, and manage property level renovations and operations.
· Manage existing pipeline of assets


Qualifications and Skills
· 3+ years of Residential and Commercial real estate experience
· Excellent written and oral communication skills
· Self-starter with tenacity and an entrepreneurial mindset
· Expert in Excel, PowerPoint, Yardi and Argus
· Detail oriented and highly organized
· Compensation and Benefits

For more information, please visit the following sites:
https://new.consensys.net/

tags: DBG:surround``2N(work, remot) 2N OR(option, allow, abl, possibl, permit)
items.content:
Digital Marketing Intern // Advanced Blockchain

Company: Advanced Blockchain

Tags:
  • Social Media
  • Online Marketing
  • Digital Marketing

    • A bit about us

    Advanced Blockchain AG designs, develops and deploys Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT) software solutions for companies and their services and operations. Our team is specifically set up to ride the blockchain revolution, possessing the experience, personnel and technological know-how to create a wide range of tailor-made blockchain systems to meet all kinds of needs.

    We’re experts in the field of Distributed Ledger Technology, we understand the ability the technology has to disrupt long-standing industries and create entirely new business models, and we’re set on channelling our knowledge and expertise into connecting the real-world with the power and potential DLT has to shape our collective future.

    The Role

    We’re looking for an ambitious marketing talent to join our young and dynamic team. Digital Marketing Interns will work closely together with the entire business development team and will actively participate in connecting the real world with Distributed Ledger Technology.

    What We Offer

    • An environment that embraces freedom and autonomy and values team spirit and open communication. We encourage you to put forward your ideas and thoughts.
    • Office / co-working / events space in the heart of Berlin.
    • The opportunity to contribute to cutting edge projects in a new and exciting industry with the potential to positively reshape our world.
    • The opportunity to ‘be your own boss’ – take responsibility for your work/projects from day one.
    • A young, international team of DLT pioneers.
    • Flexible working hours.
    • Remote working options.

    Your Responsibilities

    Social Media Management

    • Create and schedule posts through our online channels.
    • Monitor and engage with our audience.
    • Analyse and optimise content and campaigns.

    Content Marketing

    • Create either written, graphic or video – depending on what you prefer/best at.
    • Brainstorm new content/campaign ideas.
    • Help edit, revise and improve existing content.
    • Outsource elements of content creation.

    Online Marketing

    • Create and schedule email marketing campaigns.
    • SEO optimisation.
    • Help optimise websites.

    General

    • Collaborate with others in your team on what you’re doing.
    • Help strategize and don’t be afraid to put your ideas forward.
    • Report on progress at regular intervals.

    Note: Since we’re open to recruiting more than one intern, you don’t necessarily have to tick all of the points in italics above.

    Requirements

    • You have experience in online marketing / social media marketing / content marketing.
    • You have an above average understand of Distributed Ledger Technology.
    • You pay a lot of attention to detail, you’re analytical and performance driven.
    • You’re able to embody brands through the content you create and communicate.
    • You have a strong desire to learn and help educate others.
    • You’re able to work independently and proactively.
    • You’re a fluent English speaker, German is a plus.
    • You have experience with social media and online marketing management tools.

    Looking forward to hearing from you!

    Apply for this position

DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=5, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=5, embedded=0, frontend=15}
items.content:
Senior Marketing Communications Designer

Full-time
Anywhere
Remote job
Startup
Posted Aug 10 – Accepting applications
Netlify is changing the way people build web projects, and people seem to like it! We are a growing team of talented, thoughtful, and diverse people rapidly shipping features to our customers.


We’re looking for a Senior Communication Designer. As an early member of our Design team, you’ll have a big impact on our visual identity, voice and tone, team culture, and our future.

What is my role?

You’ll master the visual tone of Netlify’s marketing communications across web and other mediums, pushing it to the next level as our visual presence evolves.

You’ll craft intuitive user journeys and visually compelling layouts for our public facing web properties.

You’ll identify new opportunities to make an impact through design and envision brand-new concepts.

You’ll collaborate closely with other departments (especially marketing and product teams), facilitating communication on projects you lead.

You’ll contribute to building team-wide processes and practices to help our team grow.

What are the requirements?

Here’s what we need to see from you:

  • experience producing high-quality websites in a team design environment for marketing software products.
  • can craft stunning design comps and build out functional prototypes of your work in code.
  • effectively combine messaging, layout design, and illustration to communicate a compelling visual story.
  • work well in a sprint-based environment, shipping with an iterative mindset, balancing projects and priorities to meet deadlines.
  • have strong written communication skills and are able to clearly communicate your intentions and present your ideas.
  • have a healthy relationship with feedback, and you know how to effectively elicit it from a design review session.
  • have at least a basic understanding of how modern web technologies work and are used by our customers.
  • pay attention to detail, and you will add your favorite emoji in the first name input field when applying.
  • both embrace constraints and imagine new possibilities.
  • observe trends in the design community and care about where the industry is headed.
  • lead by example, seek to understand through active listening and questioning, actively address problems you identify, and assume responsibility for your work.
  • if remote, can work hours that at least overlap for a portion of your day with The Pacific Time Zone

How can I really impress you?

Bonus points if you:

  • have designed for marketing developer tooling products.
  • he used and contributed to visual design systems.
  • he worked in a Sketch + Abstract based workflow.
  • get excited about web development and are opinionated about front-end technologies.
  • are comfortable working in a GitHub based collaboration workflow.
  • are familiar with static build systems like Jekyll or Hugo, or front-end build tools like Webpack, Gulp, Grunt, etc.
  • have worked on themes for CMS systems like Wordpress or Shopify.

To apply for this opportunity, please provide a resume, cover letter explaining why you are interested to work with us, and a link to your portfolio website.

As part of the interview process, be prepared to present a previous project you were responsible for. We will be particularly interested to see how you approach problem-solving, decision-making, and design process to understand how you arrived at your final design decisions.

We can’t wait to meet you!

What is Netlify all about?

Netlify is a platform for developers to build, deploy, and manage modern web projects. Basically, it’s an easy to use backend for your static website.

We aim to perfect a unified platform that automates code; creating highly-performant sites and web-apps. Users should be able to simply push their code and let us take care of the rest.

We have been building Netlify since 2015. About half of our 30+ member team works remotely, and we are serving over 280,000 developers who use Netlify around the globe.

Netlify is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment. All applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

items.content:
Paid Digital Marketing Intern


Feldman+weber

Interested in this position? Please read every word below, and if you think we’re a match made in heaven, please apply!

# Responsibilities

Anything and everything. One minute you might be editing a website blog title or swapping a picture out, next you’ll be doing keyword research for our upcoming SEO campaign, and then moving to tracking down clients for approvals on web design proofs. If you want to learn digital marketing in all of its facets, this is the position for you.
## What We’re Looking For (for this particular position)
* Someone intuitive and that doesn’t need constant direction. This is a remote position and requires you to be self-sufficient, we’re here to support you as needed, but sometimes you’ll need to take the reigns and make decisions.
* Someone who is comfortable learning new things on a regular basis. Our processes, industry best practices, and technology changes rapidly, you need to be able to adapt.
* Above all else, you have to love this work. People who love digital marketing, excel at it.


**BONUS POINTS:**

* Interest in web design/dev
* Experience with Asana, GSuite, Slack, Monday, and other tools
* Have sales experience
* Enjoy writing blogs/articles/emails/anything
* Understand SEO basics (Double bonus poitns if you knwo your way around aHREF's or SEM Rush)

## Who We’re Not Looking For (for this position)

We do not want “In-the-box” mindsets. You will be asked to step out of your comfort zone and to figure it out regularly. Internships turn to careers with exposure and experience, something we aim to give you lots of.
## If You’re a Good Fit, You Probably
(If these aren’t you, that’s ok, identify what doesn’t fit with us and we can look together at whether its a deal breaker)
* Thrive working independently
* Strive for continuous self-growth (keeping yourself up to date and learning new things)
* Find yourself evaluating ads, websites, logos, and marketing materials constantly
* Are comfortable with IM tools, email, video calls, and the phone
* Genuinely care about clients (people) and not just getting things done
* Love working remotely

## What It’s Like Working Remotely with Weber Design

**Work from anywhere:** We think you work better where you are comfortable

**Equipment:** You’re required to have your own computer but whether you use Mac, Linux or Windows is not our concern. Whatever you are most comfortable with. We do provide third-party tools such as Adobe Photoshop as needed. We just bought an employee a 2k monitor, and another employee a new $2100 gaming rig, we will provide equipment for people who make a difference for us.

**Structure:** while our team works from anywhere, we are a high-performance team that collaborates intensively internally and externally. This requires structure such as regular morning kick-off video calls and communication via Slack. Make sure to tell us if you like brown M&M’s. This is not a freelance gig. It’s a full-time position in a growing team. We will work with students to fit their schedules for the right applicant.

Requirements

Tell us why you're awesome! Give some examples of why you're suited for this particular position. Copypasta emails will be instatrashcanned

See more jobs at Feldman+weber

Visit Feldman+weber's website

items.title: SEO Sales Consultant
items.content:
About Us

Design Your Way LTD is a digital marketing and lead generation start-up company.
We have a small number of websites generating leads, valued between £15,000 -£200,000. We are now looking to extend the SEO branch of our company and looking to hire a full-time sales consultant to outreach for SEO clients.

We are looking for

Self-motivated, experienced, confident, and innovative SEO Sales Consultants who can both prospect and sell local lead generation and SEO services to businesses around the UK.

Although this role is commission only, we are offering 20% of all future profits that you have generated, while the client is still active, even if you leave us. Sign up 10 clients to earn a passive income of £24,000 per year!

Job Description

This is a remote working, sales only role and you do not need to do any of the SEO work yourself.

All you really need to do is follow this process:

1. Approach business owners
2. They sign up,
3. You get paid.
4. Rinse, and repeat.

Simple!

Responsibilities

• Identify, and secure new SEO Clients.
• Maintain and grow relationships between us and the business owners.
• Negotiate a contract between us and clients that is co-beneficial.
• Able to report and mediate between us and the client.
• Able to work 2 - 3 days a week.
• Have a clear and concise strategy to secure clients within a suitable period.

Skills & Knowledge

• Experience outreaching for and acquiring SEO clients.
• Confident approaching businesses.
• Self-motivated with a passion for SEO sales.
• Disciplined with a targeted sales approach.
• Desire to exceed expectations.
• Confident to adapt sales approach via calls, e-mail, and face to face if necessary.

Benefits

• 20% ongoing profits that you have generated paid to you on a monthly basis (even if you leave us!)
• You can fit this into any lifestyle and enjoy a passive income even while you are on holiday!
• Remote working.
• Flexible working hours.
• Opportunity to stay on during future expansion on an improved deal based on performance.

I look forward to speaking with you.

items.title: BuySellAds.com: Marketing Generalist
items.content:
Marketing Generalist

Full-time
Anywhere
Remote job
Mid-sized business
Posted Aug 3 – Accepting applications

We are looking for an enthusiastic and self-driven Marketer who will be responsible for managing and growing our suite of design and development web properties.

Although each website does have an established workflow and content framework in place, the successful applicant will have the freedom, tools and time to build the brands, improve content-direction, and explore new revenue opportunities.

This completely remote role is a unique opportunity to bring all of your marketing skills together and put them to the test.

Who are we?

BuySellAds helps connect great brands with hard to reach audiences. We’re an adtech company empowering publishers and advertisers to connect more efficiently.

Don’t let the “adtech” part scare you away: our mission is to help publishers better monetize their sites so they can spend their time focusing on what they care about (their content!) rather than selling ads. We leverage our tech to improve the experience for both sides along the way.

We are a fully distributed/remote team, with 45+ people spread out across 30 cities in 6 countries. We connect weekly through a video stand up and talk constantly through Slack. We empower teammates to contribute meaningful results. We largely work around an EST schedule but are flexible.

The Ideal Candidate

  • Will take a publisher-first approach.
  • Will have a problem-solving mentality.
  • Will be naturally self-driven.
  • Will embrace web technologies.
  • Will be results-driven.
  • Will be able to prioritize tasks.
  • Will be able to work without supervision.
  • Will be a team player.
  • Will be great at communicating.
  • Will be eager to learn new skills.
  • Will be meticulous in planning.
  • Will be self-motivated.
  • Will not be afraid to experiment.
  • Will be passionate about design.

Your Responsibilities

  • Organize and provide support to a team of freelance writers, designers, and developers.
  • Plan consistent, fresh content that creative users and readers will love.
  • Assist in the design, creation, and sending of email marketing campaigns.
  • Create and schedule compelling social media content while maintaining best practices.
  • Implement a rock-solid SEO strategy across all sites.
  • Work directly with department managers in support of various business initiatives.
  • Maintain an ongoing dialog with the Sales team, and explore any new business opportunities.
  • Implement a marketing strategy and project management system for growth.
  • Keep track of the latest innovations and trends in the creative industry.
  • Maintain and build upon established business relationships.
  • Track revenue, traffic and SEO targets, and action as needed.
  • Plan and provide project management for any new web properties.
  • Share any new revenue streams and ideas with the team.

We do our best to make the hiring process fair and straightforward: we do an initial meet-and-greet Zoom screen, and follow with a team pairing to make sure our culture makes sense. We move quickly on decisions, and we aim to respond to every applicant and provide feedback where appropriate: even if we aren’t the right fit for each other, we want you to know rather than have to second-guess.

items.title: Product Marketing Manager
items.content:

Teramind

items.title: Performance Marketing Executive
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=8, go=0, nodejs=1, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=5, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=1}
items.content:
At Midrive, we’re reinventing driving and insurance for the digital generation. The old way of doing things is broken. 53% of learners fail their first test. Of those who pass, 1 in 5 crash in the first 6 months. That’s unacceptable.

Our technology helps learners find top-rated instructors and access pay-as-you-go insurance, so they can pass-first time and ultimately become safer drivers.

Since launch, over 300,000 young people in the UK have used our apps, data and tech to gain their independence. We are growing quickly and are now available in over 100 towns and cities in the UK, expanding to a new one each week.

Founded in 2013, Midrive has raised over £7.5m to date from a respected group of well-connected and supportive investors ‒ including Holiday Extras and Initial Capital. You may have heard about our recent crowdfunding round which was the 4th largest equity fund-raise target in Crowdcube's history.

We’ve recently been named #19 in the Startup 100, the annual ranking of the most game-changing and exciting new businesses launched in the last three years. We were also named ‘Digital Business of the Year’ by the Federation of Small Businesses in 2017.

Want to help us build the future of learner driving and insurance? Then join us!

REQUIREMENTS

We’re looking for someone with extensive hands-on experience of Google Adwords search campaign management, which would be their main focus in their current role. Data driven and methodical in their approach to performance marketing, they would have a proven ability to drive swift improvements in campaign performance.

This is an exciting opportunity to have an impact managing performance marketing for a fast growth startup! The purpose of the role is to drive efficiencies and growth in our performance marketing channels, including Adwords paid search and paid social campaigns.

Role objectives:

  • Build a best-in-class performance optimised paid search strategy.
  • Draw out actionable insights from performance marketing campaign data.
  • Analyse and report on campaign performance, refining CPA and ROI on all campaigns.
  • Plan, execute and report on all performance marketing channel tests and trials.
  • Develop initiatives to scale performance marketing channels in tandem with Midrive’s instructor supply growth across UK postcode areas.
  • Constantly seek out and trial relevant new channels.
  • Ensure all ad copy and creative is optimised to deliver the right message to target audiences, reflecting points of difference, addressing known customer interests and pain points in an engaging way.
  • Work closely with SEO, content and operations teams to share insights from paid performance.

Key skills and experience:

  • In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience managing Google Adwords. This is a required skill that you will be tested on, so only apply if you are confident that you meet this requirement.
  • Working knowledge of Facebook Ads and Google Analytics.
  • Good understanding of audience targeting and remarketing strategies.
  • Practical understanding of attribution modelling.
  • Experience managing large or complex paid performance channel budgets.

About you:

  • You have lived and breathed Adwords campaign management for at least 1-2 years, and are fully up-to-date with every targeting option and campaign management enhancement in the Adwords interface.
  • You may have gained your experience at a digital advertising agency, managing paid search campaigns on Google Adwords, or client-side in a B2C direct response focused business.
  • You find working with data stimulating, and can quickly draw out insights from performance marketing campaign data reports.
  • With a startup mentality, you are self motivated, a problem solver, ambitious, hard working, collaborative, and want to have an impact on business performance.
  • Ability to approach tasks as a team, and work in a fast-paced environment.
  • Excellent attention to detail and a well organised, structured approach to work and the ability to keep projects on track.
  • You speak and write in English fluently and idiomatically.

BENEFITS

At Midrive, we work hard, so that's why we make sure that we have best facilities to play harder! We have a host of perks: Free coffee and snacks, Wednesdays treats, Happy Hour Thursdays, team yoga sessions, and training/sharing sessions. We also have regular fun social events - recent adventures have included a glamping trip, escape rooms, comedy clubs, and silent discos.

Midrive is simply a great place to work. We have a fantastic team of talented people working on an interesting product they are passionate about, and a friendly, social atmosphere. We're also a dog friendly office! Add to that competitive salaries, pension plan, and other perks, it's clear why we're a top choice.

DIVERSITY

Diversity and inclusion are essential values at Midrive. We know we'll do our best and most impactful work when we feel we're represented and we belong. We're proud to actively recruit and hire talented people from a wide variety of backgrounds and experiences. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

items.title: Product Manager
items.content:
Product Manager


Continued


Location: Remote

Do you have a natural curiosity for problem solving and love collaborating with teams? Do you have a talent for keeping things simple and focused and identifying pain points in products and services to help make good products great? Does an entrepreneurial company, team, and environment help you perform at your peak?

About Our Company

A leader in online continuing education for health and education professionals for more than 18 years, continued (a division of Allied Health Media) is comprised of passionate individuals dedicated to providing an unparalleled online learning experience that enhances the lives and careers of the professionals we serve. We are a fast-paced, nimble organization of highly dedicated, professional, and passionate individuals enjoying what we do. We are certified as a great workplace by the independent analysts at Great Place to Work®. Learn more about us at continued.com.

Position Overview

We are seeking a Product Manager to assist in maintaining current products/services and to assist in the development of new products and features based on feedback from our business development manager. This position will work closely with the business development manager, project manager counterparts, business systems analyst, development leads, SMEs and QA engineers to not only define product release requirements, but to ensure current products/services are operating optimally and according to specifications. 

Responsibilities


* Understands and adheres to the overarching continued product vision, strategy, and 5 year rolling roadmap consistent with our overall strategic plan.

* Meets with multi-functional subject matter experts (SMEs) for continuous learning of all aspects of existing product lines (admin capabilities, payment processing, group sales vs. individual sales offerings, etc).

* Assumes day-to-day management and responsibility for existing products and services including product roadmap specifications/implementation.

* Prioritizes and makes definitive decisions on all product maintenance work and ticket backlogs.

* Engages in ongoing user acceptance testing and customer service insights based on customer feedback and needs from our existing product lines.

* Serves as the internal evangelist for all product/service offerings.

* Assists in the development of new products and features by completing product requirements and product development programs; establishing time schedules with team members.




Knowledge and Skill Requirements


* 3+ years experience in web product development required

* Product management experience a plus

* Bachelor's Degree preferred

* Experience with and understanding of project management and product development for multiple web and mobile consumer products

* Experience writing Product Requirement Documents (PRD’s)

* Extremely motivated and detail-oriented, energized by big challenges

* Strong analytical skills - able to provide innovative solutions to complex problems

* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

* Ability to work under pressure, meet deadlines and work in a fast-paced environment

* Ability to think ahead and anticipate problems, issues and solutions

* An organized thinker - you carefully plan projects and make detailed lists

* Enjoy collaborating, communicating, and working closely with people from a wide variety of backgrounds

* Love providing the best possible user experience - having a passion motivates you to work tirelessly to help the team deliver the best possible experiences

* Obsessed with simplicity and being able to make data-driven product decisions




Other Requirements


* Ability to work from your home office Mon-Fri, 8a-5p in your time zone

* Travel occasionally for company and department meetings




Performance Measurements

The Product Manager’s success will be measured and evaluated by the following metrics:


* Increase in overall organizational clarity, pace and delivery, expressed in metrics such as timely release of backlog tickets, quality products, customer satisfaction, and overall system performance.

* Management, prioritization and decision-making ability of ongoing development tickets related to the weaknesses and improvement of current products/services.

* Completion of post-product development evaluations from internal and external stakeholders to determine how well results were achieved.




To Apply

We value attention to detail. Applications that fail to follow these simple steps will not be considered. Include a cover letter with your resume. In your cover letter please include 1) an example of a product(s) you currently manage and specific areas where you are contributing successfully to its future development state (any emphasis within the online education industry is a plus); and 2) your salary requirements. Submissions without this information will not be considered.

See more jobs at Continued

items.title: Route Optimization Engineer
items.content:
Route Optimization Engineer


Clevertech


DESCRIPTION

Clevertech is looking for a Senior route optimization Engineer to join our global team. This role has implementation and troubleshooting responsibilities including handling constraints that change on the fly, utilize self-learning tools based on past data, and sharing results in clean interfaces.

REQUIREMENTS


* You love doing puzzles

* You have serious math skills

* You've optimized your keyboard shortcuts

* You've written and presented in front of a room that resulted in clapping

* You are able to travel inside both inside the US and out for client meetings




BENEFITS

Own Your Time

We are a completely remote team. That means we have a large amount of trust and a lot of flexibility. World travelers, young parents, nature lovers, and commute avoiders love working here. We also will pay for a co-working space in case you feel like working outside of your normal setting.

Recharge Time

We insist that you take recharge time. We are closed for major holidays and then require that you take at least two weeks a year to refresh.

Care For Yourself

You’ll receive a health/wellness monthly stipend that goes towards covering medical insurance, dental insurance or joining a gym!

Focused Work

You will work together on a dedicated team with your eye on one finish line at a time. Our teams are nimble and agile, and cover the technical range you would expect in world class product delivery teams.

Learn at your edges

We believe in learning and provide unique programs that improve your tech skills, leadership skills and even challenge you in personal development. CleverFridays, guest speakers, mentorship opportunities and in-depth industry exposure are all on offer here. And of course, if you speak at a tech conference, we cover all expenses.

Clevertech Swag

And keep your eye on the mail - we send out swag everywhere in the world and there are celebratory pictures of Clevertech socks, hoodies, and mugs all over Slack.

Want to learn more about Clevertech and the team? Check out clevertech.careers.

Clevertech Culture Video

See more jobs at Clevertech

items.title: Product Manager Trainee
items.content:
Who is the MOST inspiring person you know? What have they ACHIEVED that you really admire? Wouldn’t it be great if they would share their success secrets with YOU?

The obvious answer - YES - prompted us to embark on our mission, aiming to improve 10 million lives by 2022. By creating marketing campaigns, launching digital products or coaching our clients, PASSION.IO gives inspiring people the platform they deserve to share their message with the world and impact lives.

We are an international team with the majority of our customers in the US. We’ve grown from nothing to multi-million dollar business in under 2 years… because when you focus on impact, income will follow. We work together to not only make this company successful, but to transform our clients, our customers and ourselves into our best versions.

As we say, Do it with Passion, or not at all.

Do you think you’re the right fit?

We’ve created a software-as-a-service that allows you to build and launch native mobile apps with just a few clicks.

We are looking for an inspiring, engaged and motivated new member of our Product/IT team.

You want to become a great product manager with the vision to change the future of learning.

Your mission will be to define and further develop ground-breaking software-as-a-services and mobile apps for our partners and customers that bring the Passion.io learning experience to the next level and to millions of people anytime, anywhere.

*What you'll be working on*
* Supporting the Product Owner
# You will be assigned to the product owner who will be your mentor during the entire program
# You will drive focus product projects to leverage and bond with your mentor
# Define, structure, develop processes and tools, and show measurable results
* Benchmarking Products incl. UX/UI
# You work on product development while consistently sounding out the market to help refine the product while monitoring and optimizing key performance indicators (KPIs)
# You will have ideas for further developing our products, have a clear idea about the future product, and how it will transform the market
# You will successfully drive projects/features through the lifecycle from conception to launch
# Setting up and conducting UX tests and improve the platform
* Kanban / Scrum
# You are going to develop and prioritize product roadmaps
# Thus you are taking care of the product backlogs and prioritize them accordingly
# As part of this role you organize and set goals for sprints
# You are in charge of the technical demands of the product and make sure to motivate all stakeholders towards a common goal
* Design Thinking / Customer Obsession
# Be the user-advocate during the development process, subjecting early-stage designs to usability testing or expert review, and offering implementation suggestions from a user-centred perspective
# You keep functionality, usability, performance and quality of the product in mind
# You are in contact with customers and users to learn from them and optimize their problems
* Prep project for your new role
# In this module, you will identify and implement a complex project that prepares you for your new role

*What you'll bring to the team*
# You have first experiences with kanban and/or scrum and successfully operated sprints before
# You worked in start-ups in the product department
# You have got experience of working at the intersection of business and technology and have a basic understanding of IT infrastructure
# You are hands on and look for pragmatic solutions
# You are good at keeping the bigger picture in mind and can thus organize yourself and your team
# You have strong cross-functional communication skills

*What we offer you*
# Steep learning curve: Expect the steepest learning curve you have ever experienced - we are building a playground at passion.io to become the best version of ourselves. Meet and work with successful people worldwide to learn their success secrets.
# Value-based company: Be part of an open, honest, creative, and results-driven environment where your opinion is highly valued. We want to change the globe for the better by providing value to others.
# High-growth environment: You will be part of a strongly growing company with the opportunity to develop into a key contributor with incomparable responsibilities.
# Personal and professional development: You will tackle projects across departments and thereby gain a top-notch tool box to succeed in tackling bigger and bigger challenges.
# Autonomy / entrepreneurial work-style: You will only be measured by the results you produce and are in the driver’s seat, with full flexibility.
# Berlin: You will join our friendly and international team located in the heart of Berlin Mitte.

The obvious answer - YES - prompted us to embark on our mission, aiming to improve 10 million lives by 2022. This training program trains top talent in launching digital products globally. Program candidates will gain inside perspectives, drive day-to-day management and build deep functional expertise by rotating every 3-6 months to new functional stages with different challenges.
